reviewText:
Hot Body Competition: Hotties of the Year is fifty-four minutes and was released on June 5, 2007. The main downside of this DVD is it does not tell you what year. The only thing that gives any indication of the year is when they show the clip 2000 The Sexy Bowl. According to the DVD you are view 49 models from the past year contests and those that made the top 12 list. Numbers 12 through 6 models get about thirty seconds of air time and 5 through 1 have about a minute or more of air time. I would usually make a remark or two about each of the twelve models, but they all do the same thing - dance in the nude. First is a brief review of the past contests and then you get the Top 12 Hotties. Included in the DVD are two Penthouse Pets. My only grudge is the twelve hotties should of got more air time. Hot Body Competition: Hotties of the Year gets an A-.
